comment: She is a nice lady but not a good teacher. She's not clear on what's required for the speeches and asking her questions about it just makes it even more confusing. She complicates the most simple tasks and it's a headache to take the class.
Took forever to grade things, posted nothing online, horrible with communicating with the class about her assignments, slow to answer questions. I do not recommend.
Bad with technology, takes forever to grade speeches. Frustrating to work with overall. Do not recommend.
Not a fan. Wants everything EXACTLY her way, no room for personal opinions and/or expansion or thinking outside of the box.

Awesome professor. Very high expectations, but in a way that makes you a great speaker. Very encouraging and positive. Some of the speeches are tough and require research, but it is consistent with a 2000 level course.

She is very nice lady but this is very difficult class because of her. She grades on stuff she does not tell you to put in speeches. Very bad on returning major grades in timely matter. It is two days after our still do not our grades our major assignments. I world not  recommend to her class.

She is a nice lady, but her grading is revolting. She is very specific in what she wants but she doesn't do a very good job of explaining what she wants. You get points off for the silliest things. You may be a great speaker, but if your paperwork is lacking or you forget to staple it all together, you'll lose a lot of points. Avoid if possible.

This professor grades hard, and shes not very clear on what she wants. for every speech you do shes gonna say the exact same before and show the same power point, which is mandatory you sit through. I was the only one who laughed at her dumb jokes and she still hated me. Class was easy but she made things difficult and pointless. Wouldnt take her.

I liked this professor and the class.  The tests were hard, and you really had to read the book but I've had worse.  The power points were the study guides.  My emails were answered promptly.  The group work was easy.  The worse thing is that you don't get grades for a long, long time.

Worst professor on campus by far. Does not give clear instructions on what is wanted in class. She wants the world and gives nothing in return. Does not respond to emails unless its about a month later.  Does not actually listen to speeches because she is grading outlines as you try and give your speech.

Was late to class every day, was about a month late grading each assignment, didn't give back about a 1/3 of our major grades until the day of the final, didn't responded to emails, graded on rules and regulations that she didn't give, was extremely stubborn, lacked common sense, illegible handwriting, etc. Worst teacher I've ever had.

She is an AWESOME professor! Her only flaw is that she is too nice & people take her kindness for granted. She uses Powerpoints & posts them for the exam. You still have to read the book though. People don't like her because they actually have to study & refuse to read the POSTED syllabus & assignment guidelines. Welcome to college!

Very unclear in what she expects. Harsh grader, even though you basically have to figure the material out on your own. Nice woman but doesn't seem to fully understand what she is teaching. Stumbles through questions a lot and beats around the bush until she confuses you enough where you think she might have answered it. Wont take again.
Harsh grader, very stubborn, and in personable are three phrases that sum her up. Don't take her class unless you want to be frustrated of her lack of  patience and clarity.

This class was Organizational Communication. This wasn't her material and she didn't really know what she was teaching. When asking a question in class she stumbled her way through the answer. After the first test the highest grade was an 88 and when we went over the test there were multiple questions that were very questionable. She grades harshly

She is a really nice teacher. The class is based upon this big group project over a culture. The project isn't that bad, each member has their own part in where they do a speech on it. Each group leader takes attendance. Powerpoint on days where a group isn't presenting. Tests all multiple choice, very easy. Overall, easy class. Take it!

Professor is very nice and passionate about the subject. Class is very simple and group oriented. Go to class and participate-- as long as you do the work and study the slides, you'll do good. Class lectures can be very slow and tedious and seems very "elementary" at times.

Very nice... Fun and likeable personality.  Must participate in class, attend every class.  Study powerpoint chapters for the tests.  Must be able to work with group and give a 5 minute speech.  Overall fun class that I really enjoyed.

If you do the work, you will definitely make a good grade. She has such a big heart and is always smiling. Easy to relate to. Lots of speeches but everyone's in the same boat so its not a big deal. I would definitely recommend this class for public speaking.

The material is boring but she teaches it well and makes it simple. Everything is by powerpoint. The tests are all multiple choice and worded easily. There is one major group project that really isnt that bad but you have to speak for like 5-6 minutes by yourself.

It was hard for me to go to class because her lectures are really dull. She does put all the powerpoints online, and her tests are usually short, simple, and multiple choice. Put in some effort on the major group project and you will do fine!

Very easy going. Goodteacher. She loves and knows well what she teaches. She is flexible. But you have to do the work she ask and you will do good. one thing I like the most about her is that she knows very well what she is teaching.
really really nice professor, but very hard tests. you also have mandatory attendence or its 10% off your final grade. easy in class, but lots of work out of it.
Tests are hard but she does not really teach anything! I made a B but only b/c i did great on all the assignments. Read the book and do well on the project and you'll do fine.

very good teacher. nice and detailed.she take time for listening students. study for test, you will do fine. if expect not doing your homework or study or love to be baby seat, and get A, this is wrong spot for you. Instead, if you do your part, you will be fine. What I like most about her,is  that she knows and love what she teach.

Every speech grade hinged on who you followed. She was extremely vague with instructions, resulting in either a poor grade or 3x the work to give more than what she wanted. You would think a public speaking class would be an easy A, but that's not the case at all. Midterm & final were all pretty much common sense.

DO NOT TAKE HER.  She is seriously one of the worst teachers I have ever had.  She asks really random questions on the tests and does not cover much material in class.  I had to practially kill myslef to make a B.

She gets off topic easy.She does a 35 slide powerpoint everyday, but only covers 5 slides (and the class was 2h & 45m long).You "learn" the content for the final right before you do your presentations, so there is 4 weeks between content and final.She takes a long time to respond to e-mails and is hard to work with when you need to make up a tests.

a very nice lady but not a great teacher.  students taught most of the time (and did it better -- more variety) whereas when she taught it was always the same old powerpoint presentation.  also, tests had tricky questions -- like she was purposely trying to trip you up.  tested over some obscure material sometimes.  not the easy A i thougt it'd be

Run if you can!  Her tests are confusing, wordy, and purposefully craft to make students fell. Her lectures are non-existing. If you are brave enough to ask for help she will say: “study”  Do not take this class ever. Find another professor.  I got A’s in all my classes but hers!
Awesome professor, made class easy and fun.  Just do the assignments and come to class and you should make an A.

Ms. Diakite is a very nice person. This class was very interesting and it helps you to speak in front of an audience with confidence. I recomend this professor. Take the class, you will enjoy it tremendously!
Great professor, if you need to add an easy class take it from her. She is very fair, she will help you and the class is fun. I recomend this professor.
